崷字的基本解释

崷
qiú
〔崷崪（
z?）〕高峻的样子，如“岩峻崷崷，金石峥嵘。”

崷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》自秋切，平尤，從。］
山高貌。参见“崷崪”。

崷字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崷； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页315第27
【廣韻】【集韻】?自秋切，音酋。崷崒，山長而高貌。【班固·西都賦】巖峻崷崒。【杜甫·崔少府高齋詩】煙氛藹崷崪。　【正字通】亦作?。

崷字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
崷字的起名意思

高峻的样子，如“岩峻崷崷，金石峥嵘。”。

崷
Basic explanation of words
崷
qiú
〔崷崪(
z?)] The towering appearance, such as "Rock Junkang, Jinshizhengrong."
崷
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" cut from autumn, Pingyou, from. ]
High mountain appearance. See "崷崪".
崷
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崷; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 315 and 27
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Since autumn cut, sound chief. Weiwei, the mountain is long and tall. [Ban Gu·Xidu Fu] Yan Jun Weiwei. 【Du Fu·Cui Shaofu Gaozhai Poems】Smoke is lingering.　【Zhengzitong】also made?.
